data.title: These are the life lessons Geena Davis learned from 3 of her most famous movies
data.meta_description: Geena Davis' new memoir, Dying of Politeness, looks back on her life and career. In a conversation with NPR's Morning Edition, she reflects on some of those iconic roles and how they shaped her.
